snippet: The billionaire investor Ronald Perelman and his longtime friend and art dealer Larry Gagosian both filed lawsuits in State Supreme Court in Manhattan on Wednesday, with each man claiming the other cheated him out of millions of dollars over art...
abstract: The billionaire investor Ronald Perelman and his longtime friend and art dealer Larry Gagosian both filed lawsuits in State Supreme Court in Manhattan on Wednesday, with each man claiming the other cheated him out of millions of dollars over art purchases.

headline.main: Gagosian and Perelman File Suits Against Each Other Over Artworks
headline.print_headline: Ronald O. Perelman and Larry Gagosian File Suits Against Each Other Over Works of Art
